mapper.select: SELECT CODE_VAL, CODE_NM FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD where SYS_CD = 'ORDER_STATUSCODE' and ISUSE = 'Y' order by CODE_NO
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(substr(CCODE,6,5)),0)+1,'00000') CCODE FROM TB_TM_COUPON WHERE CCODE LIKE '%'||#{PREFIX}||'%'
SELECT CODE_VAL , CODE_NM FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD where SYS_CD = 'PAYMENT_CODE' and ISUSE = 'Y' order by CODE_NO

SELECT COUNT(distinct(a.orderno)) FROM TB_ORDERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DELIVERS B ON B.ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO LEFT JOIN TB_APPROVALS C ON
C.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO
C.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO
C.ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO D ON D.ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LEC_MST E ON E.LECCODE = D.MGNTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CA_BOOK F ON F.RSC_ID = D.MGNTNO WHERE 1=1
AND A.ORDERNO IN (SELECT ORDERNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO AND STATUSCODE = #{orderstatuscode} )
AND C.PAYCODE = #{paycode}
AND TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate}
AND TO_CHAR(B.SENDDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate}
AND INSTR(${searchtype}, #{searchkey}) > 0
AND ( INSTR(A.ORDERNO, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(A.USER_ID, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(A.USER_NM, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(D.MGNTNO, #{searchkey}) > 0
OR INSTR(B.USERNAME, #{SEARCHKEY}) > 0
OR INSTR(B.USERNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0
OR INSTR(C.PAYNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 )
and c.price = 0 AND D.PTYPE <> 'F'

SELECT COUNT(distinct(a.orderno)) FROM TB_ORDERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DELIVERS B ON B.ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO LEFT JOIN TB_APPROVALS C ON C.ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO D ON D.ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LEC_MST E ON E.LECCODE = D.MGNTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CA_BOOK F ON F.RSC_ID = D.MGNTNO WHERE 1=1
AND A.ORDERNO IN (SELECT ORDERNO FROM TB_MYLECTURE WHERE ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO AND PLAYYN = #{orderstatuscode} )
AND TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate}
AND TO_CHAR(B.SENDDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate}
AND INSTR(${searchtype}, #{searchkey}) > 0
AND ( INSTR(A.ORDERNO, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(A.USER_ID, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(A.USER_NM, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(D.MGNTNO, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(E.SUBJECT_TITLE, #{searchkey}) > 0 )
and c.price = 0 AND D.PTYPE = 'F'

SELECT COUNT(distinct(a.orderno)) FROM TB_ORDERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DELIVERS B ON B.ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO LEFT JOIN TB_APPROVALS C ON
C.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO
C.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO
C.ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO D ON D.ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LEC_MST E ON E.LECCODE = D.MGNTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CA_BOOK F ON F.RSC_ID = D.MGNTNO WHERE 1=1
AND D.USER_CANCEL = #{ucancel}
AND A.ORDERNO IN (SELECT ORDERNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO AND STATUSCODE = #{orderstatuscode} )
AND C.PAYCODE = #{paycode}
AND TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate}
AND TO_CHAR(B.SENDDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate}
AND INSTR(${searchtype}, #{searchkey}) > 0
AND ( INSTR(A.ORDERNO, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(A.USER_ID, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(A.USER_NM, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(D.MGNTNO, #{searchkey}) > 0
OR INSTR(B.USERNAME, #{SEARCHKEY}) > 0
OR INSTR(B.USERNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0
OR INSTR(C.PAYNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 )
and c.price <> 0
and (c.price = 0 or c.price <> 0)
AND D.PTYPE <> 'F'

select ROWNUM RNUM,H.orderNo, H.orders_userId, H.orders_userName || '(' || H.orders_userId || ')' orders_userName, H.orders_telNo, H.orders_cellNo, H.orders_zipcd, H.orders_addr, H.orders_email, TO_CHAR(H.orders_regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') orders_regDate,
H.delivers_sendNo, H.delivers_userName, H.delivers_telNo, H.delivers_cellNo, H.delivers_zipcd, H.delivers_addr, H.delivers_memo, H.delivers_regDate, H.delivers_sendDate,
H.approvals_price, H.approvals_addPrice, H.approvals_payCode, H.approvals_AcctNoCode, H.approvals_payName, H.approvals_point, H.refund_point, H.approvals_returnValue, H.approvals_regDate, H.approvals_RePrice, DECODE(H.approvals_payCodeName, 'PAY100', '무통장입금', 'PAY110', '카드결제', 'PAY120', '가상계좌', 'PAY130', '계좌이체', '','없음') approvals_payCodeName, H.approvals_acctNoName, H.rowCnt from( select DISTINCT(G.orderNo), G.orders_userId, G.orders_userName, G.orders_telNo, G.orders_cellNo, G.orders_zipcd, G.orders_addr, G.orders_email, G.orders_regDate,
G.delivers_sendNo, G.delivers_userName, G.delivers_telNo, G.delivers_cellNo, G.delivers_zipcd, G.delivers_addr, G.delivers_memo, G.delivers_regDate, G.delivers_sendDate,
G.approvals_price, NVL(G.approvals_addPrice,0) as approvals_addPrice, G.approvals_payCode, G.approvals_AcctNoCode, G.approvals_payName, G.approvals_point, G.refund_point, G.approvals_returnValue, G.approvals_regDate, G.approvals_RePrice, G.approvals_payCodeName, G.approvals_acctNoName, G.rowCnt from( select a.orderNo, a.USER_ID as orders_userId, a.USER_NM as orders_userName, a.TEL_NO as orders_telNo, a.PHONE_NO as orders_cellNo, a.ZIP_CODE as orders_zipcd, a.ADDRESS1 as orders_addr, a.email as orders_email, a.REG_DT as orders_regDate,
b.sendNo as delivers_sendNo, b.userName as delivers_userName, b.telNo as delivers_telNo, b.cellNo as delivers_cellNo, b.zipcd as delivers_zipcd, b.addr as delivers_addr, b.memo as delivers_memo, b.regDate as delivers_regDate, b.sendDate as delivers_sendDate,
c.price as approvals_price, c.addPrice as approvals_addPrice, NVL(c.payCode,0) as approvals_payCode, c.AcctNoCode as approvals_AcctNoCode, c.payName as approvals_payName, c.point as approvals_point, c.refund_point as refund_point, c.returnValue as approvals_returnValue, c.REG_DT as approvals_regDate, c.RePrice as approvals_RePrice, c.payCode approvals_payCodeName, c.acctNoCode approvals_acctNoName, (select count(*) from tb_order_mgnt_no where orderNo = a.orderNo
and statusCode = #{orderstatuscode}
) as rowCnt
from tb_orders a
left outer join tb_delivers b on b.orderNo = a.orderNo
left join tb_approvals c on
c.orderNo = b.orderNo
c.orderNo = a.orderNo
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_order_mgnt_no D ON D.ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LEC_MST E ON E.LECCODE = D.MGNTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_CA_BOOK F ON F.RSC_ID = D.MGNTNO
where 1=1
and a.orderNo in ( select orderNo from tb_order_mgnt_no where orderNo = a.orderNo and statusCode = #{orderstatuscode} )
and c.payCode = #{paycode}
and TO_CHAR(a.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') between #{sdate} and #{edate}
and TO_CHAR(b.sendDate, 'YYYYMMDD') between #{sdate} and #{edate}
and ${searchtype} like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%'
and 0 = 0
and ${searchtype} like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%'
and ( a.orderNo like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or a.USER_ID like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or a.USER_NM like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%'
or b.username like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%'
or c.payName like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or c.price like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' )
and c.price = 0
and c.price <> 0
and (c.price = 0 or c.price <> 0)
) G ) H order by H.orders_regDate desc, H.orderNo desc
mapper.update: update tb_approvals set payCode = 'PAY110', acctNoCode = 'ACT999' where orderNo = #{orderno}

update tb_order_mgnt_no set isCancel = 1, statusCode = #{statuscode2}, cancelDate = sysdate, updateid = #{userid}, updatedate = sysdate where orderNo = #{orderno2} and mgntNo = #{mgntno2} and iscancel <> 2
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) from tb_order_mgnt_no where (statusCode = 'DLV105' or statusCode = 'DLV130' or statusCode = 'DLV100') and orderNo = #{orderno2}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CA_BOOK SET BOOK_STOCK = BOOK_STOCK + NVL ( (SELECT CNT FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE orderno = #{orderno2} AND mgntno = #{mgntno2}) , 0) WHERE RSC_ID = #{mgntno2}
mapper.select: select b.movie_order1, b.movie_order2, b.movie_name, TO_CHAR(a.pmp_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24miss') pmp_regdate from tb_pmp_downlog@WILLBESGOSI_OLD a, TB_MOVIE b where a.Downloginfo = 'N-' || #{orderno} || '-' || #{package_no} and a.ContentID = b.movie_no

SELECT B.MOVIE_ORDER1, B.MOVIE_ORDER2, B.MOVIE_NAME, TO_CHAR (A.MOBILE_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24miss'), MOBILE_REGDATE FROM TB_MOBILE_DOWNLOG A, TB_MOVIE B WHERE ORDERNO = #{orderno} AND PACKAGE_NO = #{package_no} AND A.CONTENTID = B.MOVIE_NO

SELECT a.orderNo, b.leccode mgntNo, c.USER_NM, c.USER_ID, d.payName, d.point, b.subject_title name, a.cnt, a.price as price, a.statusCode, TO_CHAR(a.confirmDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') confirmDate, a.cancelDate, TO_CHAR(a.isconfirm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') isconfirm, b.subject_price realprice, a.isCancel, c.TID, d.payCode approvals_payCodeName, a.statusCode statusName, TO_CHAR(d.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') REG_DT, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') TO_DT, FN_GET_CODE_NM('ORDER_STATUSCODE', (SELECT STATUSCODE FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE ORDERNO = a.orderNo AND ROWNUM = 1)) STATUS_NM FROM tb_order_mgnt_no a, TB_LEC_MST b, tb_orders c, tb_approvals d WHERE a.orderNo = #{orderno} AND a.mgntNo = b.leccode AND a.orderNo = c.orderNo AND a.orderNo = d.orderNo AND a.mgntNo= #{mgntno} AND a.isCancel in (0,1)
union all
SELECT a.orderNo, b.rsc_id mgntNo, c.USER_NM, c.USER_ID, d.payName, d.point, b.book_nm name, a.cnt, a.price as price, a.statusCode, TO_CHAR(a.confirmDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') confirmDate, a.cancelDate, TO_CHAR(a.isconfirm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') isconfirm, b.price realprice, a.isCancel, c.TID, d.payCode approvals_payCodeName, a.statusCode statusName, TO_CHAR(d.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') REG_DT, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') TO_DT, FN_GET_CODE_NM('ORDER_STATUSCODE', (SELECT STATUSCODE FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE ORDERNO = a.orderNo AND ROWNUM = 1)) STATUS_NM FROM tb_order_mgnt_no a, TB_CA_BOOK b, TB_ORDERS c, TB_APPROVALS d WHERE a.orderNo = #{orderno} AND a.mgntNo = b.rsc_id AND a.orderNo = c.orderNo AND a.orderNo = d.orderNo AND a.mgntNo = #{mgntno} AND a.isCancel in (0,1)

SELECT ( SELECT SUM(TOTAL_SUM) FROM ( SELECT nvl(SUM(c.price) , 0) AS TOTAL_SUM FROM tb_orders a, tb_order_mgnt_no c WHERE a.orderNo = c.orderNo AND (a.orderNo = #{orderno}) AND c.isCancel IN (0) group by c.cnt) ) -
(SELECT nvl(b.point , 0) FROM tb_orders a, tb_approvals b WHERE a.orderNo = b.orderNo AND (a.orderNo = #{orderno})) +
(SELECT nvl((SELECT SUM(c.price) FROM tb_orders a, tb_order_mgnt_no c WHERE a.orderNo = c.orderNo AND (a.orderNo = #{orderno}) AND c.isCancel IN (2) AND c.mgntNo NOT IN (#{mgntno})), 0) from dual) from dual

select nvl((select distinct playyn from TB_MYLECTURE where orderNo = #{orderno} and package_no=#{mgntno} and rownum = 1),'N') playyn , nvl((select distinct nvl(MYLECTURE_PAUSED_COUNT, 0) from TB_MYLECTURE_PAUSE where orderNo = #{orderno} and package_no=#{mgntno} and USER_ID=#{orders_userid} and rownum = 1),0) MYLECTURE_PAUSED_COUNT , nvl((select distinct nvl(STUDY_PERCENT, 0) from TB_MYLECTURE where orderNo = #{orderno} and package_no=#{mgntno} and rownum = 1),0) STUDY_PERCENT , nvl((select nvl(SUBJECT_PRICE, 0) / nvl(SUBJECT_PERIOD, 0) from TB_LEC_MST where leccode=#{mgntno}),0) DAY_PRICE , nvl((select distinct TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') from TB_MYLECTURE where orderNo = #{orderno} and package_no=#{mgntno} and rownum = 1),TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD')) START_DATE from dual
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_order_mgnt_no a INNER Join tb_approvals d ON a.orderNo = d.orderNo WHERE (a.orderNo = #{orderno}) AND (a.isCancel = 2) AND (a.mgntNo = #{mgntno})

SELECT ABS(a.price) oldRefund , a.memo , TO_CHAR(a.confirmDate, 'YYYYMMDD') confirmDate FROM tb_order_mgnt_no a INNER Join tb_approvals d ON a.orderNo = d.orderNo WHERE (a.orderNo = #{orderno}) AND (a.isCancel = 2) AND (a.mgntNo = #{mgntno})

SELECT B.PRICE, NVL(A.PG_PRICE, (A.PRICE-A.POINT)) PG_PRICE, A.ADDPRICE, A.POINT, FN_GET_CODE_NM('PAYMENT_CODE', A.PAYCODE) PAYCODENAME, D.REG_DT, D.RET_MSG, CASE WHEN (A.PAYCODE = 'PAY120') THEN A.VACCT ELSE A.PAYCODE END AS ACCTNONAME, C.TID, FN_GET_CODE_NM('BANK', A.VCDBANK) VCDBANK, A.PAYCODE, A.PAYNAME, A.RETURNVALUE, A.VACCT, (SELECT STATUSCODE FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO AND ROWNUM = 1) STATUSCODE, FN_GET_CODE_NM('ORDER_STATUSCODE', (SELECT STATUSCODE FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO AND ROWNUM = 1)) STATUS_NM, CASE WHEN A.PAYCODE = 'PAY120' THEN DECODE((SELECT STATUSCODE FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE ORDERNO = A.ORDERNO AND ROWNUM = 1),'DLV100',NVL(A.INPUT_DT,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT+7,'YYYY.MM.DD')),'DLV105',TO_CHAR((SELECT DD.ISCONFIRM FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO DD WHERE DD.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND ROWNUM=1),'YYYY-MM-DD.HH24:MI.SS'),'') ELSE '' END STATUS_DT, ( SELECT COUNT (*) FROM TB_TM_MYCOUPON e, TB_TM_COUPON f WHERE e.CCODE = f.CCODE AND f.ADD_FLAG = 'B' AND ORDERNO = a.ORDERNO AND e.ORDERFLAG = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1 ) USE_DEL_COUPON_CNT FROM TB_APPROVALS A, TB_ORDERS C, TB_ORDERS_LOG D, ( SELECT ORDERNO, SUM(PRICE*CNT) PRICE FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE ORDERNO = #{orderno} GROUP BY ORDERNO ) B WHERE A.ORDERNO = #{orderno} AND A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND A.ORDERNO = C.ORDERNO AND A.ORDERNO = D.ORDERNO(+)

select a.sendNo, a.userName, a.telNo, a.cellNo, a.zipcd, SUBSTR(a.zipcd,1,3) zipcd_set1, decode(length(a.zipcd), 6, SUBSTR(a.zipcd,4,3), SUBSTR(a.zipcd,5,3)) zipcd_set2, a.addr, a.memo, a.sendDate, a.dleorder, decode(a.dleorder,'DLE100','택배수령','DLE110','직접수령',' ') dleorder_nm from tb_delivers a where a.orderNo = #{orderno}

select TO_CHAR(a.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') REG_DT, a.USER_ID, a.USER_NM, a.TEL_NO, a.PHONE_NO, a.ZIP_CODE, a.ADDRESS1, a.EMAIL, b.BIRTH_DAY birth_dt from tb_orders a left outer join TB_MA_MEMBER b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID where a.orderNo = #{orderno}
mapper.update: update tb_delivers set sendNo = #{sendno}, username = #{d_name}, telno = #{d_telno}, cellno = #{d_cellno}, zipcd = #{zipcd}, addr = #{juso}, memo = #{d_memo} where orderNo = #{orderno}

update TB_MYLECTURE set PERIOD = #{mylecture_period},
END_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(to_date(#{mylecture_start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD')+#{mylecture_period}-1, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')+#{mylecture_paused_period},
END_DATE = to_date(#{mylecture_start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD')+#{mylecture_period}-1,
END_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(to_date(#{START_DATE}, 'YYYYMMDD')+#{PERIOD}-1, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')+#{mylecture_paused_period},
END_DATE = to_date(#{START_DATE}, 'YYYYMMDD')+#{PERIOD}-1,
START_DATE = TO_DATE(#{mylecture_start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD')
where USERID = #{user_id} and ORDERNO = #{orderno} and PACKAGE_NO = #{package_no} and lecture_no = #{lecture_no2}

update TB_MYLECTURE set
END_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(to_date(#{mylecture_start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD')+#{mylecture_period}-1, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')+#{mylecture_paused_period},
END_DATE = to_date(#{mylecture_start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD')+#{mylecture_period}-1,
END_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(to_date(#{START_DATE}, 'YYYYMMDD')+#{PERIOD}-1, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')+#{mylecture_paused_period},
END_DATE = to_date(#{START_DATE}, 'YYYYMMDD')+#{PERIOD}-1,
START_DATE = to_date(#{mylecture_start_date}, 'YYYYMMDD')
where USERID = #{user_id} and ORDERNO = #{orderno} and PACKAGE_NO = #{package_no} and lecture_no = #{lecture_no2}

update TB_MYLECTURE_PAUSE set
mylecture_paused_period = #{mylecture_paused_period},
mylecture_paused_date1 = null, mylecture_paused_period1 = null,
mylecture_paused_date1 = to_date(#{mylecture_paused_date1}, 'YYYYMMDD'), mylecture_paused_period1 = #{mylecture_paused_period1},
mylecture_paused_date2 = null, mylecture_paused_period2 = null,
mylecture_paused_date2 = to_date(#{mylecture_paused_date2}, 'YYYYMMDD'), mylecture_paused_period2 = #{mylecture_paused_period2},
mylecture_paused_count = 0,
mylecture_paused_count = 1,
mylecture_paused_count = 2,
mylecture_paused_date3 = null, mylecture_paused_period3 = null
mylecture_paused_count = #{mylecture_paused_count}, mylecture_paused_date3 = to_date(#{mylecture_paused_date3}, 'YYYYMMDD'), mylecture_paused_period3 = #{mylecture_paused_period3}
where USER_ID = #{user_id} and ORDERNO = #{orderno} and PACKAGE_NO = #{package_no} and lecture_no = #{lecture_no2}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ORDER_REFUND ( ORDERNO, MGNTNO, PRICE, CANCELDATE, MEMO, REG_ID, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{orderno}, #{mgntno}, (#{price}+#{point}), SYSDATE, #{memo}, #{userid}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO tb_order_mgnt_no (orderNo, mgntNo, cnt, isCancel, canceldate, statuscode, price, confirmDate, isconfirm, memo,PTYPE) VALUES (#{orderno}, #{mgntno}, 1, 2, SYSDATE, 'DLV230', -(#{price}+#{point}), to_date(#{confirmdate}, 'YYYYMMDD'), to_date(#{confirmdate}, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{memo},SUBSTR(#{mgntno},1,1))

update tb_order_mgnt_no set canceldate = SYSDATE
where orderno = #{orderno}

update tb_order_mgnt_no set canceldate = ''
where orderno = #{orderno}

INSERT INTO tb_order_mgnt_no (orderNo, mgntNo, cnt, isCancel, canceldate, statuscode, price, confirmDate, isconfirm, memo,PTYPE) VALUES (#{orderno}, #{mgntno}, 1, 2, SYSDATE, 'DLV230', -#{point}, to_date(#{confirmdate}, 'YYYYMMDD'), to_date(#{confirmdate}, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{memo},SUBSTR(#{mgntno},1,1))

insert into tb_mileage_history (IDX,USERID, POINT, ORDERNO, MGNTNO, REGDATE, COMMENT1, MANAGER, SITE) values (SEQ_TB_MILEAGE_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{orders_userid}, #{point}, #{orderno}, #{mgntno}, sysdate, '포인트 환불 ' || #{point}, #{userid}, 'www.willbescop.net')
mapper.update: update TB_MA_MEMBER set USER_POINT = TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(USER_POINT) + TO_NUMBER(#{point_gap})) where USER_ID = #{orders_userid}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_mileage_history (IDX, USERID, POINT, ORDERNO, MGNTNO, REGDATE, COMMENT1, MANAGER, SITE) values (SEQ_TB_MILEAGE_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{orders_userid}, -#{point}, #{orderno}, #{mgntno}, sysdate, '포인트 환불취소 '|| -#{point}, #{userid}, 'www.willbescop.net')

insert into tb_mileage_history (IDX, USERID, POINT, ORDERNO, MGNTNO, REGDATE, COMMENT1, MANAGER, SITE) values (SEQ_TB_MILEAGE_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{temp_point}, '', '', sysdate, #{comment1}, #{admin_id}, 'www.willbescop.net')
mapper.select: SELECT USER_POINT FROM TB_MA_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userid}

select TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') regDate, NVL(A.USER_NM,'') as user_nm, NVL(A.USER_ID,'') as userid, DECODE(SEX,'M','남','F','여','') SEX, NVL(ZIP_CODE,'') as zipcd, NVL(ADDRESS1,'') as juso, NVL(ADDRESS2,'') as juso2, NVL(TEL_NO,'') as telep_no, NVL(PHONE_NO,'') as celp_no, NVL(EMAIL,'') as email, NVL(USER_POINT,'0') as point, USER_ROLE, DECODE(USER_POSITION, 'COP' ,'경찰', 'PUB', '공무원', 'GWJ', '광주', '공무원') USER_POSITION, BIRTH_DAY, B.REMARK from TB_MA_MEMBER A, TB_MA_MEMBER_INFO B where A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID(+) AND A.USER_ID = #{userid}
SELECT CODE_VAL , CODE_NM FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD where SYS_CD = #{CODE_VAL} and ISUSE = 'Y' order by CODE_NO

SELECT ROWNUM CNT, X.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM CNT,A.IDX,A.CCODE,A.USERID,A.REGDATE,A.EXPDATES,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REGDATE,' yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')+B.EXPDAY-1 , 'yyyy-mm-dd') EXPDATEE,A.ORDERNO,A.ORDERDATE,A.ORDERFLAG,A.REG_ID,B.REGPRICE,B.REGTYPE,B.CNAME,B.TCLASSCAT FROM TB_TM_MYCOUPON A, TB_TM_COUPON B WHERE TRIM(A.CCODE) = B.CCODE AND A.USERID=#{userid} ORDER BY A.REGDATE DESC )X
select COUNT(*) from TB_TM_MYCOUPON a right outer join TB_TM_COUPON b on a.ccode = b.ccode where a.userid=#{userid}

SELECT OO.ORDERNO, OO.USER_ID USERID, OO.USER_NM USERNAME, (SELECT SUBJECT_TITLE FROM TB_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE = DECODE(OM.PTYPE, 'D', TM.PACKAGE_NO, TM.LECTURE_NO)) SUBJECT_TITLE, OM.PRICE, TO_CHAR(OM.ISCONFIRM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ISCONFIRM, OM.OPEN_ADMIN_ID, OM.MEMO, DECODE(OM.STATUSCODE, 'DLV105', '승인', 'DLV230', '환불') STATUS_NM, TM.PACKAGE_NO, TM.LECTURE_NO, TO_CHAR(TM.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MYLECTURE_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(TM.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MYLECTURE_END_DATE, TM.STUDY_PERCENT MYLECTURE_STUDY_PERCENT FROM TB_ORDERS OO LEFT JOIN TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO OM ON OM.ORDERNO = OO.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MYLECTURE TM ON TM.USERID = OO.USER_ID AND TM.ORDERNO = OO.ORDERNO AND TM.PACKAGE_NO=OM.MGNTNO WHERE SUBSTR(OM.MGNTNO,1,1) IN ('D', 'J', 'N', 'P','Y') AND OM.ISCANCEL = 0 AND OM.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105', 'DLV230') AND OO.USER_ID = #{userid} ORDER BY OO.ORDERNO DESC, SUBJECT_TITLE, OM.SDATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_orders OO left join tb_order_mgnt_no OM on OM.orderNo = OO.orderNo Left Outer Join TB_MYLECTURE TM On TM.USERID = OO.USER_ID And TM.orderNo = OO.orderNo And TM.package_no=OM.mgntNo WHERE SUBSTR(OM.MGNTNO,1,1) IN ('D', 'J', 'N', 'P') and OM.isCancel = 0 and OM.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105', 'DLV230') and OO.USER_ID = #{userid}

SELECT A.ORDERNO, TO_CHAR(B.ISCONFIRM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ISCONFIRM, A.USER_ID, A.USER_NM, A.TID, B.MGNTNO, B.PRICE, B.PTYPE, D.PRICE_DISCOUNT_REASON, DECODE(B.STATUSCODE, 'DLV105', '승인', 'DLV230', '환불') STATUS_NM, C.SUBJECT_TITLE, C.SUBJECT_REAL_PRICE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.SUBJECT_OPEN_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') SUBJECT_OPEN_DATE FROM TB_OFF_ORDERS A, TB_OFF_ORDER_MGNT_NO B, TB_OFF_LEC_MST C, TB_OFF_APPROVALS D WHERE A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105', 'DLV230') AND B.MGNTNO = C.LECCODE AND A.ORDERNO = D.ORDERNO AND A.USER_ID = #{userid} ORDER BY A.ORDERNO DESC, B.ISCONFIRM ASC, C.SUBJECT_OPEN_DATE DESC

SELECT ROWNUM CNT, SEND_DT, READ_DT , '쪽지' STS , CONT , READ_YN FROM TB_NOTE_SEND_INFO WHERE FROM_USERID = #{userid}
AND TO_CHAR(SEND_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') between #{sdate} and #{edate}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_BOARD_CS ( REG_DT , BOARD_MNG_SEQ , BOARD_SEQ , CS_DIV , CS_KIND , OPEN_YN , SUBJECT , CONTENT , REG_ID , REG_NM , ACTION_YN , COUNSELOR_ID , CREATENAME ) VALUES ( SYSDATE , 'CSBOARD_ON' , SEQ_TB_BOARD_CS_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{ccode_top} , #{ccode} , 'N' , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_VAL = #{ccode_top} AND SYS_CD = 'CSBOARD_GUBUN') || ' ' || (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_VAL = #{ccode} AND SYS_CD = #{ccode_top})
, #{content} , #{userid} , #{username} , #{actionflag} , #{USER_ID} , #{USER_NM} )
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM CNT, IDX ,VOCCODE ,DECODE(VOCCODE,'A','통화','B','재통화','C','부재중','D','거절','E','번호오류','F','관심회원') VOCCODE_NM ,DUTYCODE ,DECODE(DUTYCODE,'001','9급공무원','002','7급공무원','003','법원/검찰/교정','005','세무/관세','006','소방공무원','007','군무원','008','경찰공무원','999','독서실','') DUTYCODE_NM ,CONTENT ,REQUSERID ,REQUSERNAME ,REGUSERID ,REGUSERNAME ,TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') REG_DT , TO_CHAR(UPDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') UPD_DT FROM TB_TM_BOARD WHERE REQUSERID = #{userid} ORDER BY IDX DESC
SELECT CODE_VAL , CODE_NM FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE SYS_CD='TM_VOCCODE' ORDER BY CODE_VAL

SELECT ID, CODE, NAME, ISUSE, DECODE(ISUSE, 'Y', '활성', 'N', '비활성') ISUSE_NM , REG_DT, REG_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_ID FROM TB_CATEGORY_INFO WHERE ISUSE = 'Y' AND USE_ON = 'Y' AND P_CODE = 'CLASSCODE' ORDER BY CODE ASC

select A.CCODE ,A.CNAME ,A.CCONTENT ,A.REGDATE ,A.REGTYPE ,A.REGPRICE ,A.EXPDATES ,A.EXPDATEE ,A.EXPDAY ,A.TCLASS ,A.TCLASSCAT ,A.PUB_COUPON_GUBUN ,SYSDATE THISTIME
,(select count(*) from TB_TM_MYCOUPON where CCODE = A.CCODE and USERID = #{userid}) as ISALLOC
from TB_TM_COUPON A ORDER BY TO_CHAR(EXPDATEE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') desc, TCLASSCAT desc, regprice desc

select A.CCODE ,A.CNAME ,A.CCONTENT ,A.REGDATE ,A.REGTYPE ,A.REGPRICE ,A.EXPDATES ,A.EXPDATEE ,A.EXPDAY ,A.TCLASS ,A.TCLASSCAT ,A.PUB_COUPON_GUBUN ,SYSDATE THISTIME
,(select count(*) from TB_TM_MYCOUPON where CCODE = A.CCODE and USERID = #{userid}) as ISALLOC
from TB_TM_COUPON A WHERE 0=0 AND (ADD_FLAG = 'O' OR ADD_FLAG IS NULL)
AND A.CCODE LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHGIFTTEXT}||'%'
AND A.CNAME like '%'||#{SEARCHGIFTTEXT}||'%'
AND (A.CCODE like '%'||#{SEARCHGIFTTEXT}||'%' OR A.CNAME like '%'||#{SEARCHGIFTTEXT}||'%')
ORDER BY TO_CHAR(EXPDATEE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') desc, TCLASSCAT desc, regprice desc

select A.CCODE ,A.CNAME ,A.CCONTENT ,A.REGDATE ,A.REGTYPE ,A.REGPRICE ,A.EXPDATES ,A.EXPDATEE ,A.EXPDAY ,A.TCLASS ,A.TCLASSCAT ,A.PUB_COUPON_GUBUN ,SYSDATE THISTIME
,(select count(*) from TB_TM_MYCOUPON where CCODE = A.CCODE and USERID = #{userid}) as ISALLOC
from TB_TM_COUPON A WHERE 0=0 AND ADD_FLAG = 'M'
AND A.CCODE LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHMOTEXT}||'%'
AND A.CNAME like '%'||#{SEARCHMOTEXT}||'%'
AND (A.CCODE like '%'||#{SEARCHMOTEXT}||'%' OR A.CNAME like '%'||#{SEARCHMOTEXT}||'%')
ORDER BY TO_CHAR(EXPDATEE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') desc, TCLASSCAT desc, regprice desc

select COUNT(*) from TB_TM_COUPON WHERE 0=0 AND (ADD_FLAG = 'O' OR ADD_FLAG IS NULL)
AND CCODE LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHGIFTTEXT}||'%'
AND CNAME like '%'||#{SEARCHGIFTTEXT}||'%'
AND (CCODE like '%'||#{SEARCHGIFTTEXT}||'%' OR CNAME like '%'||#{SEARCHGIFTTEXT}||'%')

select COUNT(*) from TB_TM_COUPON WHERE 0=0 AND ADD_FLAG = 'M'
AND CCODE LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHMOTEXT}||'%'
AND CNAME like '%'||#{SEARCHMOTEXT}||'%'
AND (CCODE like '%'||#{SEARCHMOTEXT}||'%' OR CNAME like '%'||#{SEARCHMOTEXT}||'%')
select COUNT(*) from TB_TM_MYCOUPON where ccode = #{ccode} and 1 = 2 and userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TM_COUPON( CCODE, CNAME, CCONTENT, REGDATE, REGTYPE, REGPRICE, EXPDATES, EXPDATEE, EXPDAY, TCLASS, TCLASSCAT, PUB_COUPON_GUBUN, ADD_FLAG ) VALUES( #{CCODE}, #{CNAME}, #{CCONTENT}, SYSDATE, #{REGTYPE}, #{REGPRICE}, #{EXPDATES}, #{EXPDATEE}, #{EXPDAY}, #{TCLASS}, #{TCLASSCAT}, #{PUB_COUPON_GUBUN}, #{ADD_FLAG} )

INSERT INTO TB_TM_MYCOUPON ( IDX , CCODE , USERID , REGDATE , EXPDATES , EXPDATEE , ORDERFLAG , REG_ID ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(IDX), 0) + 1 FROM TB_TM_MYCOUPON) , #{ccode} , #{userid} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , to_date(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')+#{eday} , '0' ,#{USER_ID} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , USER_NM , PHONE_NO , EMAIL FROM TB_MA_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
select USER_ID , USER_NM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_OFF_ORDER_MGNT_NO WHERE ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO} AND ISCANCEL = 0) CNT from TB_OFF_ORDERS WHERE ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_OFF_ORDERS SET TICKET_PRINT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO}
UPDATE TB_OFF_ORDERS SET TICKET_PRINT_DT = '' WHERE ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO}
INSERT INTO TB_OFF_ORDERS_TICKET (ORDERNO, TICKET_PRINT_DT) VALUES (#{ORDERNO}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT ORDERNO, TICKET_PRINT_DT FROM TB_OFF_ORDERS_TICKET WHERE ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO} ORDER BY TICKET_PRINT_DT DESC

select CODE , NAME from TB_CATEGORY_INFO where ISUSE = 'Y' and CODE is not null and CODE != 'HOME' and CODE != '999'
order by CODE asc

SELECT CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE SYS_CD = 'LEC_FORM' AND CODE_VAL = A.LEC_DIV AND ISUSE = 'Y') || '-' || NAME AS NAME FROM TB_LEARNING_FORM_INFO A where ISUSE = 'Y'
order by CODE
SELECT SUBJECT_CD , SUBJECT_NM FROM TB_SUBJECT_INFO WHERE ISUSE = 'Y' ORDER BY SUBJECT_CD

select LECCODE , NVL(SUBJECT_REAL_PRICE,0) SUBJECT_REAL_PRICE , NVL(LEC_SCHEDULE,0) LEC_SCHEDULE , DECODE(NVL(LEC_SCHEDULE,0),0,0,NVL(NVL(SUBJECT_REAL_PRICE,0) / NVL(LEC_SCHEDULE,0),0)) DAY_PRICE , (select COUNT(*) from TB_OFF_LECTURE_DATE where LECCODE = #{LECCODE} AND LEC_DATE <= SYSDATE) USE_SCHEDULE , (NVL(LEC_SCHEDULE,0) - (select COUNT(*) from TB_OFF_LECTURE_DATE where LECCODE = #{LECCODE} AND LEC_DATE <= SYSDATE)) * (DECODE(NVL(LEC_SCHEDULE,0),0,0,NVL(NVL(SUBJECT_REAL_PRICE,0) / NVL(LEC_SCHEDULE,0),0))) PRICE from TB_OFF_LEC_MST where LECCODE = #{LECCODE}
select GET_NEXTSEQ_OFFORDERNO(#{USER_ID}) USER_ID from dual
select GET_NEXTSEQ_OFFORDERNO('M') ORDERNO from dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_OFF_ORDER_MGNT_NO ( ISCANCEL , ORDERNO , MGNTNO , PRICE , CNT , STATUSCODE , CONFIRMDATE , ISCONFIRM , CONFIRMID , REG_ID , REG_DT , PTYPE ) VALUES ( 0 , #{ORDERNO} , #{MGNTNO} , #{SUBJECT_REAL_PRICE} , 1 , 'DLV105' , SYSDATE , #{REG_DT} , #{USERID} , #{USERID} , SYSDATE , SUBSTR(#{MGNTNO},1,1) )
mapper.select: SELECT A.ORDERNO , A.USER_ID , A.USER_NM , A.PHONE_NO , A.EMAIL , A.TICKET_PRINT_DT , B.PRICE_DISCOUNT_TYPE , B.PRICE_DISCOUNT , B.PRICE_DISCOUNT_REASON , B.PRICE , B.PRICE_CARD , B.PRICE_CASH , B.PRICE_BANK , B.PRICE_UNPAID , B.CARD_NAME , B.MEMO , TO_CHAR(DECODE(B.REG_DT, NULL, A.REG_DT, B.REG_DT), 'YYYYMMDD') ISCONFIRM , TO_CHAR(B.DUE_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') DUE_DT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REG_DT , C.REFUND_PAY , C.REFUND_CARD , C.REFUND_CASH , C.ACC_BANK_NAME , C.ACC_BANK_NUM , C.ACC_BANK_DEPOSITOR , C.REFUND_MEMO , TO_CHAR(C.SET_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') SET_DATE FROM TB_OFF_ORDERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OFF_APPROVALS B ON A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OFF_REFUND C ON A.ORDERNO = C.ORDER_ID WHERE A.ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO}

SELECT B.ISCONFIRM, B.PRICE, B.PTYPE, D.MIN_DT, D.MAX_DT, C.SUBJECT_TITLE, DECODE(E.PAYCODE, 'PAY110', '카드', 'PAY120', '가상', 'PAT130', '계좌', 'PAY140', '현금', 'PAY100', '통장', '-') PAYNAME, FN_GET_PKG_TEACHER_NM(A.ORDERNO, B.MGNTNO) SUB_TITLE FROM TB_OFF_ORDERS A, TB_OFF_ORDER_MGNT_NO B, TB_OFF_LEC_MST C, TB_OFF_APPROVALS E, (SELECT CC.LECCODE, TO_CHAR(MIN(AA.LEC_DATE), 'MM/DD') MIN_DT, TO_CHAR(MAX(AA.LEC_DATE), 'MM/DD') MAX_DT FROM TB_OFF_LECTURE_DATE AA, TB_OFF_MYLECTURE BB, TB_OFF_LEC_JONG CC WHERE AA.LECCODE = BB.LECTURE_NO AND BB.LECTURE_NO = CC.MST_LECCODE GROUP BY CC.LECCODE UNION ALL SELECT DD.LECCODE, TO_CHAR(MIN(DD.LEC_DATE), 'MM/DD') MIN_DT, TO_CHAR(MAX(DD.LEC_DATE), 'MM/DD') MAX_DT FROM TB_OFF_LECTURE_DATE DD GROUP BY DD.LECCODE) D WHERE A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.MGNTNO = C.LECCODE AND C.LECCODE = D.LECCODE AND A.ORDERNO = E.ORDERNO AND A.ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO} AND B.MGNTNO = #{MGNTNO}

SELECT (SELECT SUBJECT_TITLE FROM TB_OFF_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE = A.MGNTNO) || '(' || decode((SELECT SUBJECT_TYPE FROM TB_OFF_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE = A.MGNTNO), '1', '실강', '2', '실시간 영상') || ') ' || (select (CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(min(LEC_DATE), 'YYYYMMDD') > TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN '진행전' WHEN TO_CHAR(min(LEC_DATE), 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') and TO_CHAR(max(LEC_DATE), 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN '진행중' ELSE '종강' END) from TB_OFF_LECTURE_DATE where LECCODE = A.MGNTNO) SUBJECT_TITLE , (SELECT SUBJECT_TITLE FROM TB_OFF_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE = A.MGNTNO) SUBJECT_TITLE2 , (SELECT NVL(SUBJECT_REAL_PRICE,0) FROM TB_OFF_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE = A.MGNTNO) SUBJECT_REAL_PRICE , (SELECT NVL(LEC_SCHEDULE,0) FROM TB_OFF_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE = A.MGNTNO) LEC_SCHEDULE , A.PRICE , A.MGNTNO LECCODE , 'Y' LIST_YN , PTYPE FROM TB_OFF_ORDER_MGNT_NO A WHERE A.ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO} AND A.ISCANCEL = 0
UNION ALL SELECT SUBJECT_TITLE, SUBJECT_TITLE, SUBJECT_REAL_PRICE, LEC_SCHEDULE, B.REALPRICE, LECCODE, 'N' LIST_YN , A.LEC_TYPE_CHOICE PTYPE FROM TB_OFF_LEC_MST A, TB_OFF_MYLECTURE B WHERE A.LECCODE = B.LECTURE_NO AND B.PACKAGE_NO <> B.LECTURE_NO AND B.ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO}
SELECT SUBJECT_TITLE, SUBJECT_PRICE FROM TB_OFF_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE IN (SELECT LECTURE_NO FROM TB_OFF_MYLECTURE WHERE ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_OFF_ORDER_MGNT_NO ( ISCANCEL , ORDERNO , MGNTNO , PRICE , CNT , STATUSCODE , CONFIRMDATE , ISCONFIRM , CANCELDATE , CONFIRMID , REG_ID , REG_DT , PTYPE ) VALUES ( 2 , #{ORDERNO} , #{MGNTNO} , #{SUBJECT_REAL_PRICE} , 1 , 'DLV230' , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , #{USERID} , #{USERID} , SYSDATE , SUBSTR(#{MGNTNO},1,1) )

INSERT INTO TB_MYLECTURE ( USERID, ORDERNO, PACKAGE_NO, LECTURE_NO, START_DATE, END_DATE, PERIOD, REG_DT, STUDY_PERCENT, STOP_LECTURE, PLUS_BUY, ADD_LENGTH ) SELECT A.USER_ID, A.ORDERNO, B.MGNTNO, B.MGNTNO, SYSDATE, (SYSDATE + (C.SUBJECT_PERIOD-1)), C.SUBJECT_PERIOD, A.REG_DT, 0, 'T', 0, 0 FROM TB_ORDERS A, TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO B, TB_LEC_MST C WHERE A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.MGNTNO = C.LECCODE AND A.ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO} AND B.MGNTNO = #{MGNTNO}

INSERT INTO TB_MYLECTURE ( USERID, ORDERNO, PACKAGE_NO, LECTURE_NO, START_DATE, END_DATE, PERIOD, STUDY_PERCENT, STOP_LECTURE, PLUS_BUY, ADD_LENGTH ) SELECT A.USER_ID, A.ORDERNO, B.MGNTNO, D.LECCODE, SYSDATE, (SYSDATE + ((SELECT SUBJECT_PERIOD FROM TB_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE = B.MGNTNO)-1)), (SELECT SUBJECT_PERIOD FROM TB_LEC_MST WHERE LECCODE = B.MGNTNO), 0, 'T', 0, 0 FROM TB_ORDERS A, TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO B, TB_LEC_JONG C, TB_LEC_MST D WHERE A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.MGNTNO = C.LECCODE AND C.MST_LECCODE = D.LECCODE AND A.ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO} AND B.MGNTNO = #{MGNTNO}
mapper.select: SELECT POINT FROM TB_CA_BOOK WHERE RSC_ID = #{mgntno}
mapper.update: CALL PKG_CART.SP_INSERT_MISS_ORDER( #{orderno, mode=IN}, #{user_id, mode=IN}, #{leccode, mode=IN}, #{price, mode=IN}, #{pay_type, mode=IN}, #{tid, mode=IN}, #{reg_id, mode=IN} )
mapper.select: SELECT AA.*, BB.CURR_TIME, BB.TOTAL_TIME, BB.STUDY_PERCENT, BB.STUDY_TIME, BB.LAST_POSITION_TIME, BB.UPD_DT, BB.STUDY_DT FROM (SELECT C.ORDERNO, C.PACKAGE_NO, C.LECTURE_NO, D.MOVIE_NO, D.MOVIE_NAME, D.MOVIE_DATA_FILE_YN, D.MOVIE_DATA_FILENAME, D.MOVIE_TIME, D.MOVIE_ORDER1, D.MOVIE_ORDER2, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MYMOVIE_LOG WHERE ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO} AND PACKAGE_NO = #{PACKAGE_NO} AND LECTURE_NO = #{LECTURE_NO} AND USERID = A.USER_ID AND MOVIE_NO = D.MOVIE_NO) LOG_CNT FROM TB_ORDERS A, TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO B, TB_MYLECTURE C, VW_TB_MOVIE D WHERE A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.ORDERNO = C.ORDERNO AND B.MGNTNO = C.PACKAGE_NO AND C.LECTURE_NO = D.ORG_LECCODE AND C.ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO} AND C.PACKAGE_NO = #{PACKAGE_NO} AND C.LECTURE_NO = #{LECTURE_NO} AND B.STATUSCODE != 'DLV230') AA, TB_MYMOVIE BB WHERE AA.ORDERNO = BB.ORDERNO(+) AND AA.PACKAGE_NO = BB.PACKAGE_NO(+) AND AA.LECTURE_NO = BB.LECTURE_NO(+) AND AA.MOVIE_NO = BB.MOVIE_NO(+) ORDER bY AA.MOVIE_NO ASC
SELECT LECCODE FROM TB_LEC_MST WHERE CATEGORY_CD ='081' AND LEC_TYPE_CHOICE = 'Y' AND LECCODE = #{package_no}
SELECT count(*) FROM TB_ORDER_YEARPACKAGE WHERE ORDERNO = #{orderno} AND SUBJECT_TEACHER IN ('wc_005', 'wc_007')
SELECT SUBJECT_TEACHER FROM TB_ORDER_YEARPACKAGE WHERE ORDERNO = #{orderno} AND SUBJECT_TEACHER IN ('wc_005', 'wc_007')
SELECT TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') REG_DT FROM TB_ORDER_YEARPACKAGE WHERE ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO} AND SUBJECT_TEACHER IN ('wc_005', 'wc_007')
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_ORDER_YEARPACKAGE SET
SUBJECT_TEACHER ='wc_005'
SUBJECT_TEACHER ='wc_007'
WHERE ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO}
AND SUBJECT_TEACHER ='wc_007'
AND SUBJECT_TEACHER ='wc_005'
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM TB_MYLECTURE WHERE ORDERNO = #{ORDERNO} AND LECTURE_NO IN ( SELECT MST_LECCODE FROM( SELECT T1.MST_LECCODE, T1.SORT, T1.GUBUN , TBL.* , (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CATEGORY_INFO WHERE CODE = TBL.CATEGORY_CD) AS CATEGORY_NM , (SELECT NAME FROM TB_LEARNING_FORM_INFO WHERE CODE = TBL.LEARNING_CD) AS LEARNING_NM , (SELECT SUBJECT_NM FROM TB_SUBJECT_INFO WHERE SUBJECT_CD = TBL.SUBJECT_SJT_CD) AS SUBJECT_NM , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_MA_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = TBL.SUBJECT_TEACHER) AS SUBJECT_TEACHER_NM FROM TB_LEC_JONG T1 INNER JOIN TB_LEC_MST TBL ON T1.MST_LECCODE = TBL.LECCODE WHERE T1.LECCODE = #{PACKAGE_NO} AND TBL.LEC_TYPE_CHOICE = 'D'
and SUBJECT_TEACHER ='wc_007'
and SUBJECT_TEACHER ='wc_005'
ORDER BY T1.SORT ASC ) )
